title: Crone Islam and Politics Secondary SAQ1

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify ONE claim that the author makes in the passage regarding the political differences between the Muslim world and Europe before 1450. b) Identify ONE specific piece of evidence not found in the passage from the Muslim world OR from Europe in the period before 1450 that could be used to support the author’s main argument in the passage. c) Explain how ONE development in the Muslim world during the period before 1450 would challenge the author’s claim that “government was the inseparable companion of religion.”
